translation: Cruze o deserto ardente.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Cross the searing desert.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote os Magos!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Wizards!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote o Centauro de Chamas!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Flame Centaur!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: Ugh! Este calor está me matando.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ugh! This heat is killing me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A luz do sol reflete na areia,{LF}fazendo parecer ainda mais quente.{#Name="Octa"}
source: The sunlight reflects off the sand,{LF}making it seem even hotter.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Talvez remover suas roupas{LF}pudesse proporcionar um pouco de alívio?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps removing your clothes{LF}would provide a bit of relief?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Vá em frente! Eu não me importo!{LF}Só tire-as aqui mesmo!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Go on! I don't mind!{LF}Just take them off right here!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Cale-se. Você está me fazendo ficar mais quente.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up. You're making me hotter.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Grrr! O que diabos? Sinto como se estivesse queimando!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Grrr! What the hell? It feels like I'm burning up!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: A luz do sol parece ter aumentado repentinamente.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: The sunlight seems to have suddenly grown stronger.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Não podemos fazer nada sobre isso?{LF}Está sugando a vida de mim.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Can't we do anything about it?{LF}It's suckin' the life out of me.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Isso não é um acidente. Há algo{LF}estranho acontecendo aqui.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This is no accident. There's something{LF}weird going on here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Talvez nossos inimigos estejam usando magia{LF}para amplificar os raios do sol.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Perhaps our foes are using magic{LF}to amplify the sun's rays.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Aqui vamos novamente com a magia.{LF}Realmente conveniente pra caralho!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Here we go again with the magic.{LF}Real fuckin' convenient!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Eu apostaria que há um feiticeiro{LF}lançando feitiços por perto.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I wager there might be a wizard{LF}casting spells nearby.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Escondendo como uma bicha, hã? Figura.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hiding like a little bitch, huh? Figures.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Vou rasgar o cu dele! E então um terceiro!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'll tear him a new asshole! And then a third!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ha ha ha! É o meu Z!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha! That's my Z!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Essa luz do sol odiosa é outra coisa.{LF}É o suficiente para me deixar mole também!{#Name="Octa"}
source: This odious sunlight is something else.{LF}It's enough to make even me go limp!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Devemos ficar na sombra para preservar nossa energia.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: We'd best stay in the shade to preserve our energy.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: O que há de errado? Não devia você{LF}estar reclamando de algo?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's wrong? Shouldn't you be{LF}complaining about something?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Muito quente. Não posso falar.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Too hot. Can't talk.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Talvez uma história ajude!{LF}Deixe-me contar sobre a vez em que eu estava em um bordel{LF}com um cacto e três vixens lindas...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps a story would help!{LF}Let me tell you of the time I was in a brothel{LF}with a cactus and three lovely vixens...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Pare. Está piorando.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Stop. Making it worse.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: A luz do sol não está incomodando você, minha senhora?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Is the sunlight not bothering you, my lady?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Leva mais do que um pouco de luz do sol para me machucar. {#Name="Zero"}
source: It takes more than a little sunlight to hurt me. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ainda assim, por favor não exagere.{LF}Melhor ficar na sombra.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Still, please don't overdo it.{LF}Best stick to the shade.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Droga, todo esse esconder na sombra{LF}está começando a me irritar!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit, all this hiding in the shade{LF}is really starting to piss me off!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Não é como se tivéssemos uma escolha.{LF}Este sol é um assassino de discípulos!{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's not like we have a choice.{LF}This sun is a disciple killer!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nós não somos todos invencíveis como você, lembra?{#Name="Dito"}
source: We aren't all invincible like you, remember?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Bem, isso ainda me irrita.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, it still pisses me off.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Senhora Zero, cuidado onde pisa.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Zero, watch where you step.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Nnngh! Isso está demorando muito!{LF}Como é grande essa área!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nnngh! This is taking forever!{LF}How big IS this area!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ho ho. Viagem é como amor doce: uma jornada terrivelmente{LF}longa para um clímax curto demais!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho. Travel is like sweet love: a terribly{LF}long journey for an all-too-short climax!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Pare de tentar ser profundo, Octa.{LF}Isso não lhe cai bem.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Quit trying to be deep, Octa.{LF}It doesn't suit you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Decadus"}
source: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Tendo problemas, Decadus?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Having trouble, Decadus?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nnngh... De fato, estou... Mas...{LF}Eu enfrentarei qualquer prova pelo bem da minha lady.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnngh... Indeed, I am... But...{LF}I will face any trial for my lady's sake.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: {#Name="デカート"}
source: {#Name="デカート"}

translation: Você tem certeza de que é por ela? Você parece muito animado.{#Name="Dito"}
source: You sure it's for her? You seem awfully excited.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Esses são os filhos da puta que conjuraram{LF}esse sol. Matem-nos!{#Name="Zero"}
source: These are the fuckers who conjured{LF}up that sunlight. Kill 'em!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Melhor ficarmos de olho.{LF}Vejo outro sol conjurado lá!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! We'd better watch out.{LF}I see another conjured sun over there!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh, that's just wonderful.
source: Oh, that's just wonderful.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I think I'm about to go insane.
source: I think I'm about to go insane.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Great. Now we've got a giant, flaming man-horse.
source: Great. Now we've got a giant, flaming man-horse.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I don't mind any of those words{LF}on their own, but together...
source: I don't mind any of those words{LF}on their own, but together...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Where's the shrine?
source: Where's the shrine?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Up ahead, I'd imagine.{LF}But let's deal with this foe first.
source: Up ahead, I'd imagine.{LF}But let's deal with this foe first.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: It's growing weaker.
source: It's growing weaker.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Good. Let's kill it and move on already!
source: Good. Let's kill it and move on already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Finally... The Shrine of Sands.
source: Finally... The Shrine of Sands.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: After decimating the enemy's base,
source: After decimating the enemy's base,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Zero discovered documents pointing to the location of the Shrine of Sands.
source: Zero discovered documents pointing to the location of the Shrine of Sands.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But the path that would take her there was{LF}a blistering hell that punished all trespassers...
source: But the path that would take her there was{LF}a blistering hell that punished all trespassers...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Stay in the shade to recover your strength!
source: Stay in the shade to recover your strength!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: It's too hot! Damn it! Die!
source: 暑すぎる！　クソ！　死ね！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: I'll make you die a miserable death for using this miserable magic on me……
source: このクソみたいな魔法を出したクソには、{LF}クソみたいに死んでもらうからな……{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: This is so annoying……
source: イチイチイチイチ面倒な事しやがって……{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Again……
source: またか……{#Name="ゼロ"}
